login_length: Your login must be contain from 5 to 30 symbols
login_symbols: Your login must be contain only english letters and numbers
password_length: Your password must be contain from 5 to 32 symbols
new_password_length: Your new password must be contain from 5 to 32 symbols
repass_required: Please, type your password again. Your passwords is not equal.
pass_no_equal: Your passwords is not equal. Please, check a passwords and try again.
pass_equal: New password cannot equal with your Current password
auth_wrong: Failed to authenticate. Login/Password is wrong.
login_exists: User with this login already registred. Please, type another login.
auth_requried: You need login for complete this action.
uid_required: Request is not contain user identifier. Please, try again later.
profile_not_found: Player profile is not found on game servers.
wrong_email: Please, type your real email address.
banned_timed: Your account has been banned by administration. Ban is end:
banned_forever: Your account has been permanently banned by administration.
email_exists: Sorry, but this email already registred. Please, type another email.
email_not_exists: User with this email is not found.
account_deactived: Your account is not active. Follow the link in our email or
account_already_actived: Your account already activated or you are paste wrong activation URL into your browser. You can sign in using your login/password
user_notfound: User with this login not found
reset_time: You are already request password reset. Please, check your email or try again after 5 minutes.
reset_complete: Password recovery instructions was sended on your email.
reset_code_not_found: Recovery code is not found. Maby, you are already reset your password or paste wrong URL into your browser.
auth_data_not_found: Authentication data for this profile is not found. Maby you are sign up with social networks for this account?
reset_completed: Password recovery procedure is completed. Now you can login with your new password.
change_avatar_desc: Click on photo for open uploading window and change avatar
wrong_nickname: Your fullname must be contain only latin or cyrillic letters, numbers or spaces and must be from 2 to 40 symbols
fullname_required: Please, type your real full name
activation_line_1:
Hello!
You are get this mail because your email was used for registration on our website.

Please, follow the link to activate your account:
activation_line_2:
If you are not register on our website - just delete this mail.

Regards, {{site_name}} administration!
reset_line_1:
Hello!
You are get this mail because your email was used for recover your password on our website.

Please, follow the link to reset your password:
reset_line_2:
If you are not initialize this procedure - just delete this mail and change your current password.

Regards, {{site_name}} administration!
signin_desc: Sign in with your account and unlock all website features.
signup_desc: Create a new account for unlock all website features by few clicks.
forgot_desc: Forgot your password? Just type your email and we send instructions for reset your password.
confirm_desc: Please, activate your account for complete registration process.
reset_desc: Forgot your password? Just type your email and we send instructions for reset your password.
profile_desc: Manage and edit your profile on our website.
confirm_message_1: To complete your registration you must an activate your account. Activation instruction was sended on your email.
confirm_message_2: Thank you for account activation. Now you can sign in using your login and password.
user_creation_desc: Fill the form below for create a new user
account_banned_forever: Your profile has been blocked forever by administration. Please, contact us for details.
account_banned_for: Your profile has been blocked by administration. Please, contact us for details.
user_creation_required: Please, fill all fields and choose user role before you are create a new user
user_confirm_remove_text: Are you sure want to remove this user? You cannot cancel this action!
user_confirm_canceled_desc: User deletion operation has been canceled
user_banning_desc: If you want to block this account - choose banning options and click "Save"
user_uid_required: Request is not contain information about account UID. Please, reload page and try again.
ban_reason_required: Please, fill the ban reason. Banning reason must be contain from 10 to 100 symbols.
ban_time_required: Please, choose a time for banning
avatar_not_found: Failed to find user avatar on server storage
wrong_birthday: The birthday must be written in format DD.MM.YYYY and must be contain not longer than 12 symbols
wrong_phone: Phone number must contain only numbers, "-", "+", spaces (Example: +1 800 300-3000, or 18003003000), and must be contain not longer than 20 symbols
profile_saved_self: You are changed your profile information
wrong_auth_method: You are logined with social networks. Please, sign in with your login and password to change your password.
